title: Quick Question
body:
Why is jarvan more expensive than the other 4800 Champs on sale?


Probably something simple but i thought I'd ask anyway

replies.body:
Thank you very much for that info :)

I'm very grateful.
no guys they are kinda like promoting him, like that time they did it with irelia and her skin, jar van is only 30% off instead of 50%
it could be of the 50% sale
